Package com.nrifintech.cms.controllers

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.controllers.MenuController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/menu/") public class MenuController extends Object
> This class is a controller that handles requests to the `/menu` endpoint

    • newMenu

      @PostMapping("addmenu") public Response newMenu​(@RequestBody MenuDto menuDto)
      It creates a new menu.
      Parameters:
      menuDto - This is the object that will be sent to the server.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • submitMenu

      @PostMapping("submitmenu/{id}") public Response submitMenu​(@PathVariable Integer id, Principal principal)
      > Submit a menu for review
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the menu to be submitted.
      principal - This is the user who is logged in.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • getMenu

      @GetMapping("getmenu/{id}") public Response getMenu​(@PathVariable Integer id)
      > This function returns a menu with the given id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the menu to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • getMonthlyMenu

      @GetMapping("getmonthmenu") public Response getMonthlyMenu​(Principal principal)
      It returns the monthly menu for the user.
      Parameters:
      principal - This is the user object that is passed to the controller.
      Returns:
      A list of Menu objects.

    • removeMenu

      @PostMapping("removemenu/{menuId}") public Response removeMenu​(@PathVariable Integer menuId)
      It removes a menu from the database.
      Parameters:
      menuId - The id of the menu to be removed.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • approveMenu

      @PostMapping("approvemenu/{menuId}/{approvalStatusId}") public Response approveMenu​(@PathVariable Integer menuId, @PathVariable Integer approvalStatusId)
      > Approve a menu by setting its approval status to either `Approved` or `Rejected`
      Parameters:
      menuId - The id of the menu to be approved.
      approvalStatusId - The status of the menu.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • addItemsToMenu

      @PostMapping("additemstomenu/{menuId}/{itemIds}") public Response addItemsToMenu​(@PathVariable Integer menuId, @PathVariable List<String> itemIds)
      > Add items to a menu
      Parameters:
      menuId - The id of the menu you want to add items to.
      itemIds - a list of item ids to add to the menu
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • removeItemFromMenu

      @PostMapping("removefrommenu/{menuId}/{itemId}") public Response removeItemFromMenu​(@PathVariable Integer menuId, @PathVariable Integer itemId)
      > Removes an item from a menu
      Parameters:
      menuId - The id of the menu you want to remove an item from.
      itemId - The id of the item to be removed from the menu.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • getMenuByDate

      @GetMapping("getbydate/{date}") public Response getMenuByDate​(@PathVariable Date date, Principal principal)
      It returns a list of menus for a particular date
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which you want to get the menu.
      principal - This is the user who is logged in.
      Returns:
      A list of menus
